items.sentence: I suspected that Tom was just being sarcastic.
What time does the next train to Boston leave?
Tom was writing a letter to Mary this morning.
If my help is no longer needed, I'll be going.
The two men seemed to want to kill each other.
I thought that I heard a car drive up outside.
Tom didn't do that because he was told not to.
I'm surrounded by a lot of incompetent people.
You should've introduced yourself to the girl.
Our new school building is under construction.
